title: Andreas Jung
content:
Born: Schorndorf, 1968.

Education  
He studied Graphic Design at the Staatliche Akademie der Bildenden Künste in Stuttgart.

Career  
February 1994: Founded the group “Lahm” dedicated to experimental book design.  
1995: Published FF Trombo with FontFont.

External Links:  
 [Bio page at FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124121/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/designer/andreas_jung/)  
 [FF Trombo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124121/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_trombo/)
author: Jared Benson
